channel.title: 2016 on lecta collecta
channel.description: Recent content in 2016 on lecta collecta

item.title: Excerpts from 2016 reading
item.description: Take me to the first quote from: The Histories by Herodotus;Carolyn Dewald;Robin Waterfield, Landscapes of Communism: A History Through Buildings by Owen Hatherley, How to Write a Thesis by Umberto Eco;Caterina Mongiat Farina;Geoff Farina;Francesco Erspamer, Man and His Symbols by Carl Gustav Jung, Pěna dni/Červená tráva by Boris Vian, Age of Ambition by Evan Osnos, Mastering the Art of Soviet Cooking by Anya Von Bremzen, Meditations by Marcus Aurelius (Emperor of Rome); Gregory Hays, The Aeneid by Virgil, The Homeric Hymns by Rayor, Diane J.
